message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's in great condition and I believe it will be worth every penny to you. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. I'm looking to save some money, but I'm still willing to pay a fair price for it.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product, but $7,500 is too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $8,500.  This is still a great deal for you considering its value to you is $10,000.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $8,500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $7,000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
